claimStartDate.label: What date do you want to claim from?
claimStartDate.hint: You need evidence to cover the period – for example, a fit note (also known as a sick note) or an isolation note if you’re self-isolating because of coronavirus.

errors.required: Enter the date you want to claim from
errors.missingDay: Date you want to claim from must include a day
errors.missingMonth: Date you want to claim from must include a month
errors.missingYear: Date you want to claim from must include a year
errors.missingDayAndMonth: Date you want to claim from must include a day and a month
errors.missingDayAndYear: Date you want to claim from must include a day and a year
errors.missingMonthAndYear: Date you want to claim from must include a month and a year
errors.badFormatYear: Enter the date you want to claim from with a year in the right format, for example 2001 not 01
errors.notReal: Enter a real date you want to claim from
errors.notRealDigits: Enter a real date you want to claim from using only digits
errors.outOfRange: Claim date cannot be more than 3 months in the future
